00018 //
00019 // *** FileRecord
00020 //
00021 FileRecord::FileRecord(int lumi, const string &file, const string &path):
00022   smParameter_(stor::Configurator::instance()->getParameter()),
00023   fileName_(file),
00024   basePath_(path),
00025   fileSystem_(""),
00026   workingDir_("/open/"),
00027   logPath_(path+"/log"),
00028   logFile_(logFile()),
00029   setupLabel_(""),
00030   streamLabel_(""),
00031   cmsver_(getReleaseVersion()),
00032   lumiSection_(lumi),
00033   runNumber_(0),
00034   fileCounter_(0),
00035   fileSize_(0), 
00036   events_(0), 
00037   firstEntry_(0.0), 
00038   lastEntry_(0.0),
00039   whyClosed_(0)
00040 {
00041    // stripp quotes if present
00042    if(cmsver_[0]=='"') cmsver_=cmsver_.substr(1,cmsver_.size()-2);
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 //
00047 // *** write summary information in catalog
00048 //
00049 void FileRecord::writeToSummaryCatalog()
00050 {
00051   ostringstream currentStat;
00052   string ind(":");
00053   currentStat << workingDir()           << ind
00054         << fileName()  
00055         << fileCounterStr()       << ind
00056         << fileSize()             << ind 
00057         << events()               << ind
00058               << timeStamp(lastEntry()) << ind
00059         << (int) (lastEntry()-firstEntry()) << ind
00060         << whyClosed_ << endl;
00061   string currentStatString (currentStat.str());
00062   ofstream of(smParameter_->fileCatalog().c_str(), ios_base::ate | ios_base::out | ios_base::app );
00063   of << currentStatString;
00064   of.close();
00065 }

00068 //
00069 // *** write file information to log
00070 //
00071 void FileRecord::updateDatabase()
00072 {
00073   std::ostringstream oss;
00074   oss << "./closeFile.pl "
00075       << " --FILENAME "     << fileName() << fileCounterStr() <<  ".dat"
00076       << " --FILECOUNTER "  << fileCounter_                       
00077       << " --NEVENTS "      << events_                            
00078       << " --FILESIZE "     << fileSize_                          
00079       << " --STARTTIME "    << (int) firstEntry()
00080       << " --STOPTIME "     << (int) lastEntry()
00081       << " --STATUS "       << "closed"
00082       << " --RUNNUMBER "    << runNumber_                         
00083       << " --LUMISECTION "  << lumiSection_                      
00084       << " --PATHNAME "     << filePath()
00085       << " --HOSTNAME "     << smParameter_->host()
00086       << " --SETUPLABEL "   << setupLabel_ 
00087       << " --STREAM "       << streamLabel_                      
00088       << " --INSTANCE "     << smParameter_->smInstance()        
00089       << " --SAFETY "       << smParameter_->initialSafetyLevel()
00090       << " --APPVERSION "   << cmsver_
00091       << " --APPNAME CMSSW"
00092       << " --TYPE streamer"               
00093       << " --DEBUGCLOSE "   << whyClosed_
00094       << " --CHECKSUM "     << hex << adlerstream_
00095       << " --CHECKSUMIND "  << hex << adlerindex_
00096       << "\n";
00097 
00098   ofstream of(logFile_.c_str(), ios_base::ate | ios_base::out | ios_base::app );
00099   of << oss.str().c_str();
00100   of.close();
00101 }

00104 //
00105 // *** write file information to log
00106 //
00107 void FileRecord::insertFileInDatabase()
00108 {
00109   std::ostringstream oss;
00110   oss << "./insertFile.pl "
00111       << " --FILENAME "     << fileName() << fileCounterStr() <<  ".dat"
00112       << " --FILECOUNTER "  << fileCounter_                       
00113       << " --NEVENTS "      << events_                            
00114       << " --FILESIZE "     << fileSize_                          
00115       << " --STARTTIME "   << (int) firstEntry()
00116       << " --STOPTIME "    << (int) lastEntry()
00117       << " --STATUS "       << "open"
00118       << " --RUNNUMBER "    << runNumber_                         
00119       << " --LUMISECTION "  << lumiSection_                      
00120       << " --PATHNAME "     << filePath()
00121       << " --HOSTNAME "     << smParameter_->host()
00122       << " --SETUPLABEL "   << setupLabel_ 
00123       << " --STREAM "       << streamLabel_                      
00124       << " --INSTANCE "     << smParameter_->smInstance()        
00125       << " --SAFETY "       << smParameter_->initialSafetyLevel()
00126       << " --APPVERSION "  << cmsver_
00127       << " --APPNAME CMSSW"
00128       << " --TYPE streamer"               
00129       << " --CHECKSUM 0"
00130       << " --CHECKSUMIND 0"
00131       << "\n";
00132 
00133   ofstream of(logFile_.c_str(), ios_base::ate | ios_base::out | ios_base::app );
00134   of << oss.str().c_str();
00135   of.close();
00136 }

00139 //
00140 // *** return a formatted string for the file counter
00141 //
00142 string FileRecord::fileCounterStr() const
00143 {
00144   std::ostringstream oss;
00145   oss << "." << setfill('0') << std::setw(4) << fileCounter_;
00146   return oss.str();
00147 }

00149 
00150 //
00151 // *** return the full path
00152 //
00153 string FileRecord::filePath() const
00154 {
00155   return ( basePath_ + fileSystem_ + workingDir_);
00156 }
00157 
00158 
00159 //
00160 // *** return the complete file name and path (w/o file ending)
00161 //
00162 string FileRecord::completeFileName() const
00163 {
00164   return ( basePath_ + fileSystem_ + workingDir_ + fileName_ + fileCounterStr() );
00165 }
00166 
00167 
00168 // 
00169 // *** set the current file system
00170 // 
00171 void FileRecord::fileSystem(int i)
00172 {
00173   std::ostringstream oss;
00174   oss << "/" << setfill('0') << std::setw(2) << i; 
00175   fileSystem_ = oss.str();
00176 }

00178 
00179 //
00180 // *** move index and streamer file to "closed" directory
00181 //
00182 void FileRecord::moveFileToClosed()
00183 {
00184   struct stat64 initialStatBuff, finalStatBuff;
00185   int statStatus;
00186   double pctDiff;
00187   bool sizeMismatch;
00188 
00189   string openIndexFileName      = completeFileName() + ".ind";
00190   string openStreamerFileName   = completeFileName() + ".dat";
00191   statStatus = stat64(openStreamerFileName.c_str(), &initialStatBuff);
00192   if (statStatus != 0) {
00193     throw cms::Exception("FileRecord", "moveFileToClosed")
00194       << "Error checking the status of open file "
00195       << openStreamerFileName << ".  Has the file moved unexpectedly?"
00196       << std::endl;
00197   }
00198   sizeMismatch = false;
00199   if (smParameter_->exactFileSizeTest()) {
00200     if (fileSize_ != initialStatBuff.st_size) {
00201       sizeMismatch = true;
00202     }
00203   }
00204   else {
00205     pctDiff = calcPctDiff(fileSize_, initialStatBuff.st_size);
00206     if (pctDiff > 0.1) {sizeMismatch = true;}
00207   }
00208   if (sizeMismatch) {
00209     throw cms::Exception("FileRecord", "moveFileToClosed")
00210       << "Found an unexpected open file size when trying to move "
00211       << "the file to the closed state.  File " << openStreamerFileName
00212       << " has an actual size of " << initialStatBuff.st_size
00213       << " instead of the expected size of " << fileSize_ << std::endl;
00214   }
00215 
00216   int ronly  = chmod(openStreamerFileName.c_str(), S_IREAD|S_IRGRP|S_IROTH);
00217   ronly     += chmod(openIndexFileName.c_str(), S_IREAD|S_IRGRP|S_IROTH);
00218   if (ronly != 0) {
00219     throw cms::Exception("FileRecord", "moveFileToClosed")
00220       << "Unable to change permissions of " << openStreamerFileName << " and "
00221       << openIndexFileName << " to read only." << std::endl;
00222   }
00223 
00224   workingDir_ = "/closed/";
00225   string closedIndexFileName    = completeFileName() + ".ind";
00226   string closedStreamerFileName = completeFileName() + ".dat";
00227 
00228   int result = rename( openIndexFileName.c_str()    , closedIndexFileName.c_str() );
00229   result    += rename( openStreamerFileName.c_str() , closedStreamerFileName.c_str() );
00230   if (result != 0) {
00231     throw cms::Exception("FileRecord", "moveFileToClosed")
00232       << "Unable to move " << openStreamerFileName << " to "
00233       << closedStreamerFileName << ".  Possibly the storage manager "
00234       << "disk areas are full." << std::endl;
00235   }
00236 
00237   statStatus = stat64(closedStreamerFileName.c_str(), &finalStatBuff);
00238   if (statStatus != 0) {
00239     throw cms::Exception("FileRecord", "moveFileToClosed")
00240       << "Error checking the status of closed file "
00241       << closedStreamerFileName << ".  This file was copied from "
00242       << openStreamerFileName << ", and the copy seems to have failed."
00243       << std::endl;
00244   }
00245   sizeMismatch = false;
00246   if (smParameter_->exactFileSizeTest()) {
00247     if (initialStatBuff.st_size != finalStatBuff.st_size) {
00248       sizeMismatch = true;
00249     }
00250   }
00251   else {
00252     pctDiff = calcPctDiff(initialStatBuff.st_size, finalStatBuff.st_size);
00253     if (pctDiff > 0.1) {sizeMismatch = true;}
00254   }
00255   if (sizeMismatch) {
00256     throw cms::Exception("FileRecord", "moveFileToClosed")
00257       << "Error moving " << openStreamerFileName << " to "
00258       << closedStreamerFileName << ".  The closed file size ("
00259       << finalStatBuff.st_size << ") is different than the open file size ("
00260       << initialStatBuff.st_size << ").  Possibly the storage manager "
00261       << "disk areas are full." << std::endl;
00262   }
00263 }
00264 
00265 
00266 //
00267 // *** move error event file to "closed" directory
00268 //
00269 void FileRecord::moveErrorFileToClosed()
00270 {
00271   struct stat64 initialStatBuff, finalStatBuff;
00272   int statStatus;
00273   double pctDiff;
00274   bool sizeMismatch;
00275 
00276   string openErrorFileName   = completeFileName() + ".dat";
00277   statStatus = stat64(openErrorFileName.c_str(), &initialStatBuff);
00278   if (statStatus != 0) {
00279     throw cms::Exception("FileRecord", "moveErrorFileToClosed")
00280       << "Error checking the status of open error file "
00281       << openErrorFileName << ".  Has the file moved unexpectedly?"
00282       << std::endl;
00283   }
00284   sizeMismatch = false;
00285   if (smParameter_->exactFileSizeTest()) {
00286     if (fileSize_ != initialStatBuff.st_size) {
00287       sizeMismatch = true;
00288     }
00289   }
00290   else {
00291     pctDiff = calcPctDiff(fileSize_, initialStatBuff.st_size);
00292     if (pctDiff > 0.1) {sizeMismatch = true;}
00293   }
00294   if (sizeMismatch) {
00295     throw cms::Exception("FileRecord", "moveErrorFileToClosed")
00296       << "Found an unexpected open file size when trying to move "
00297       << "the file to the closed state.  File " << openErrorFileName
00298       << " has an actual size of " << initialStatBuff.st_size
00299       << " instead of the expected size of " << fileSize_ << std::endl;
00300   }
00301 
00302   int ronly  = chmod(openErrorFileName.c_str(), S_IREAD|S_IRGRP|S_IROTH);
00303   if (ronly != 0) {
00304     throw cms::Exception("FileRecord", "moveErrorFileToClosed")
00305       << "Unable to change permissions of " << openErrorFileName
00306       << " to read only." << std::endl;
00307   }
00308 
00309   workingDir_ = "/closed/";
00310   string closedErrorFileName = completeFileName() + ".dat";
00311 
00312   int result = rename( openErrorFileName.c_str() , closedErrorFileName.c_str() );
00313   if (result != 0) {
00314     throw cms::Exception("FileRecord", "moveErrorFileToClosed")
00315       << "Unable to move " << openErrorFileName << " to "
00316       << closedErrorFileName << ".  Possibly the storage manager "
00317       << "disk areas are full." << std::endl;
00318   }
00319 
00320   statStatus = stat64(closedErrorFileName.c_str(), &finalStatBuff);
00321   if (statStatus != 0) {
00322     throw cms::Exception("FileRecord", "moveErrorFileToClosed")
00323       << "Error checking the status of closed file "
00324       << closedErrorFileName << ".  This file was copied from "
00325       << openErrorFileName << ", and the copy seems to have failed."
00326       << std::endl;
00327   }
00328   sizeMismatch = false;
00329   if (smParameter_->exactFileSizeTest()) {
00330     if (initialStatBuff.st_size != finalStatBuff.st_size) {
00331       sizeMismatch = true;
00332     }
00333   }
00334   else {
00335     pctDiff = calcPctDiff(initialStatBuff.st_size, finalStatBuff.st_size);
00336     if (pctDiff > 0.1) {sizeMismatch = true;}
00337   }
00338   if (sizeMismatch) {
00339     throw cms::Exception("FileRecord", "moveErrorFileToClosed")
00340       << "Error moving " << openErrorFileName << " to "
00341       << closedErrorFileName << ".  The closed file size ("
00342       << finalStatBuff.st_size << ") is different than the open file size ("
00343       << initialStatBuff.st_size << ").  Possibly the storage manager "
00344       << "disk areas are full." << std::endl;
00345   }
00346 }
00347 
00348 
00349 string FileRecord::timeStamp(double time) const
00350 {
00351   time_t rawtime = (time_t)time;
00352   tm * ptm;
00353   ptm = localtime(&rawtime);
00354   ostringstream timeStampStr;
00355   string colon(":");
00356   string slash("/");
00357   timeStampStr << setfill('0') << std::setw(2) << ptm->tm_mday      << slash 
00358          << setfill('0') << std::setw(2) << ptm->tm_mon+1     << slash
00359          << setfill('0') << std::setw(4) << ptm->tm_year+1900 << colon
00360                << setfill('0') << std::setw(2) << ptm->tm_hour      << slash
00361          << setfill('0') << std::setw(2) << ptm->tm_min       << slash
00362          << setfill('0') << std::setw(2) << ptm->tm_sec;
00363   return timeStampStr.str();
00364 }
00365 
00366 
00367 string FileRecord::logFile() const
00368 {
00369   time_t rawtime = time(0);
00370   tm * ptm;
00371   ptm = localtime(&rawtime);
00372 
00373   ostringstream logfilename;
00374   logfilename << logPath_ << "/"
00375               << setfill('0') << std::setw(4) << ptm->tm_year+1900
00376               << setfill('0') << std::setw(2) << ptm->tm_mon+1
00377               << setfill('0') << std::setw(2) << ptm->tm_mday
00378               << "-" << smParameter_->host()
00379               << "-" << smParameter_->smInstance()
00380               << ".log";
00381   return logfilename.str();
00382 }

00384 
00385 void FileRecord::checkDirectories() const
00386 {
00387   checkDirectory(basePath());
00388   checkDirectory(fileSystem());
00389   checkDirectory(fileSystem()+"/open");
00390   checkDirectory(fileSystem()+"/closed");
00391   checkDirectory(logPath_);
00392 }
00393 
00394 
00395 void FileRecord::checkDirectory(const string &path) const
00396 {
00397   struct stat64 buf;
00398 
00399   int retVal = stat64(path.c_str(), &buf);
00400   if(retVal !=0 )
00401     {
00402       edm::LogError("StorageManager") << "Directory " << path
00403               << " does not exist. Error=" << errno ;
00404       throw cms::Exception("FileRecord","checkDirectory")
00405             << "Directory " << path << " does not exist. Error=" << errno << std::endl;
00406     }
00407 }
00408 
00409 
00410 double FileRecord::calcPctDiff(long long value1, long long value2) const
00411 {
00412   if (value1 == value2) {return 0.0;}
00413   long long largerValue = value1;
00414   long long smallerValue = value2;
00415   if (value1 < value2) {
00416     largerValue = value2;
00417     smallerValue = value1;
00418   }
00419   return ((double) largerValue - (double) smallerValue) / (double) largerValue;
00420 }

00423 //
00424 // *** report status of FileRecord
00425 //
00426 void FileRecord::report(ostream &os, int indentation) const
00427 {
00428   string prefix(indentation, ' ');
00429   os << "\n";
00430   os << prefix << "------------- FileRecord -------------\n";
00431   os << prefix << "fileName            " << fileName_                   << "\n";
00432   os << prefix << "basePath_           " << basePath_                   << "\n";  
00433   os << prefix << "fileSystem_         " << fileSystem_                 << "\n";
00434   os << prefix << "workingDir_         " << workingDir_                 << "\n";
00435   os << prefix << "logPath_            " << logPath_                    << "\n";
00436   os << prefix << "logFile_            " << logFile_                    << "\n";
00437   os << prefix << "setupLabel_         " << setupLabel_                 << "\n";
00438   os << prefix << "streamLabel_        " << streamLabel_                << "\n";
00439   os << prefix << "hostName_           " << smParameter_->host()        << "\n";
00440   os << prefix << "fileCatalog()       " << smParameter_->fileCatalog() << "\n"; 
00441   os << prefix << "lumiSection_        " << lumiSection_                << "\n";
00442   os << prefix << "runNumber_          " << runNumber_                  << "\n";
00443   os << prefix << "fileCounter_        " << fileCounter_                << "\n";
00444   os << prefix << "fileSize            " << fileSize_                   << "\n";
00445   os << prefix << "events              " << events_                     << "\n";
00446   os << prefix << "first entry         " << firstEntry_                 << "\n";
00447   os << prefix << "last entry          " << lastEntry_                  << "\n";
00448   os << prefix << "why closed          " << whyClosed_                  << "\n";
00449   os << prefix << "-----------------------------------------\n";  
00450 }
